doctors.name: Dr. Ayesha Sharma
doctors.About: Dr. Ayesha Sharma is deeply dedicated to providing holistic and patient-centered medical care, with a strong emphasis on preventive health, accurate diagnosis, and personalized treatment plans. doctors.name: Dr. Kavita Nair
doctors.About: Dr. Kavita Nair specializes in women's reproductive health, offering expert guidance and compassionate care in prenatal, postnatal, and hormonal health. She is passionate about empowering women through informed medical decisions.

doctors.name: Dr. Rohan Mehta
doctors.About: Dr. Rohan Mehta offers expert care in treating various skin, hair, and nail conditions. He combines clinical excellence with cosmetic dermatology to achieve long-lasting, confident results for his patients.

doctors.name: Dr. Priya Menon
doctors.About: Dr. Priya Menon provides warm and expert care for children from infancy through adolescence. She emphasizes preventive pediatric care and child development, ensuring both physical and emotional well-being.

doctors.name: Dr. Sameer Khan
doctors.About: Dr. Sameer Khan is a leading neurologist specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of brain and nerve disorders. He believes in precision diagnosis and long-term neurological health through patient education and advanced therapy.

doctors.name: Dr. Neha Singh
doctors.About: Dr. Neha Singh focuses on the digestive system, offering treatments for chronic GI issues with a patient-first approach. Her commitment lies in combining dietary guidance with modern medicine for effective results.

doctors.name: Dr. Priya Menon
doctors.About: Dr. Priya Menon is passionate about providing comprehensive care to children with a blend of kindness and clinical excellence. She emphasizes parental involvement and early developmental screenings.

doctors.name: Dr. Sameer Khan
doctors.About: With a patient-centric approach, Dr. Sameer Khan delivers expert care in managing complex neurological disorders. His focus is on accurate diagnostics and compassionate follow-ups.

doctors.name: Dr. Neha Singh
doctors.About: Specializing in gastrointestinal health, Dr. Neha Singh offers evidence-based treatments and lifestyle coaching to improve digestive wellness for all age groups.

doctors.name: Dr. Sameer Khan
doctors.About: Renowned for his deep knowledge in neurotherapy, Dr. Sameer Khan leads with empathy and skill, treating conditions like epilepsy, stroke, and migraines with a long-term care mindset.
